data.name: Motioning Monument
data.detailed_description:
This game that need a little imagination, exploring the abstract landscape and aim of revive the mysterious monument.

To revive the monument, Need to build a unique motion.
The Object with motion fragment are hidden in landscape.
Collect and place them in the right place on the stone board to revive the monument.

Walking a bit can be a hassle, but there isn't much to do.
Enjoy the exploring and letting your imagination run wild!

Features

  • Simple UI and operation
  • Full controller support
  • Steam Cloud
  • Addition of new levels(planned)

#1 Grass field


It is a refreshing the grass fields with the wind.
Find the pieces hidden in the grass.

data.short_description: This game that need a little imagination, exploring the abstract landscape and aim of revive mysterious monument. Collect motion fragments and place them in the right place to revive the monument. Enjoy the exploring and letting your imagination run wild!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (sharder model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
